Service Details: - Provides a safe, respectful place for youth and young adults to access information about different issues and provides help and support to deal with them- 24 hour distress line- Live online one-to-one chat available 12:00pm - 1:00am every day in BC and the Yukon- Email support (responds within two business days)- Also provides topic-specific information and resources about various youth-related issues
Hours: Distress Line:  24 hours per day / 7 days per weekOnline Chat:  12:00pm - 1:00am every day in BC and the Yukon
